daily_fact: A community fundraiser has been launched to support the wife of a Connecticut man, showcasing the resilience and compassion of neighbors coming together in times of tragedy.
topline_md: Recent updates from New York City include a water-main break causing street damage in the Bronx, a tragic fire resulting in a death, and a construction worker's rescue after a fall. Additionally, winter weather threatens post-Thanksgiving travel, while NYC's composting efforts set new records.
